doc.previous: There is a view that modern anti ship weapons systems such as torpedoes and missiles have made aircraft carriers obsolete as too vulnerable for modern combat 16 On the other hand the threatening role of aircraft carriers has a place in modern asymmetric warfare like the gunboat diplomacy of the past citation needed Furthermore aircraft carriers facilitate quick and precise projections of overwhelming military power into such local and regional conflicts 17
doc.after: Most navies operate only one or two aircraft carriers if any The USA is a notable exception with 10 super carriers and 9 amphibious assault ships in service
